    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Skala</string>
            <string language="en">Peel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Casca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Buccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φλούδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cáscara</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">För att avbilda ett föremål behöver man ofta förstora eller förminska det. För att tala om graden av förändring anger man en skala.
Modul 5 - Geometri.
Matematik A.</string>
            <string language="en">In order to project an object needs one often to enlarge or to decrement it. In order to speak about the degree of change states one a scale.
Module 5 - geometry.
Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Matematik A</string>
            <string language="sv">geometri</string>
            <string language="sv">skala</string>
            <string language="sv">sträcka i bild</string>
            <string language="sv">sträcka i föremål</string>
            <string language="sv">likformiga trianglar</string>
            <string language="sv">likformig triangel</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematics A</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
            <string language="en">peel</string>
            <string language="en">stretch in picture</string>
            <string language="en">stretch in objects</string>
            <string language="en">uniform triangles</string>
            <string language="en">uniform triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwecks eine Nachricht zu projizieren benötigt 
ein häufig es zu vergrößern oder zu verringern. Zwecks über 
den Grad der Änderung Zustände ein sprechen ein scale.Module 5 - 
geometry.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Afin de projeter un objet a besoin d'on souvent 
pour l'agrandir ou décrémenter. Afin de parler au sujet du 
degré d'états de changement un un scale.Module 5 - 
geometry.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A fim projetar um objeto necessita um 
frequentemente ampliá-lo ou decrecer. A fim falar sobre o grau 
de estados da mudança um um scale.Module 5 - geometry.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per proiettare un oggetto ha bisogno spesso di 
uno di ingrandirlo o decrement. Per parlare del grado di 
cambiamento dichiara uno uno scale.Module 5 - 
geometry.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκειμένου να προβληθεί ένα αντικείμενο χρειάζεται 
το ένα συχνά για να διευρύνει ή στη μείωση αυτό. 
Προκειμένου να μιλήσει για το βαθμό αλλαγής δηλώνει το ένα
μια ενότητα 5 κλίμακας - μαθηματικά Α γεωμετρίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para proyectar un objeto necesita uno a menudo 
agrandarlo o decrement. Para hablar sobre el grado de estados 
del cambio uno un scale.Module 5 - geometry.Mathematics A.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik A</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
